scene.description: Stylish restroom dressing area captured via mirror
scene.environment: Warm wood-laminate stall doors and soft countertop reflections

aesthetic.look: Warm interior color gentle roll-off minimal grain filmic soft contrast

lighting.description: Ceiling LEDs providing warm ambience add subtle front fill from mirror to open eye sockets maintain realistic specular highlights

demographics.build: Very slender petite with defined waist

appearance.hair: Messy top-bun with full fringe a few loose side strands
appearance.skin: Natural dewy finish with preserved skin texture

pose.action: Gentle smile with lips slightly pressed left hand lightly lifting ruched hem right hand holding phone
pose.framing: Waist-up 3:4 vertical slight downward camera angle midriff visible

wardrobe.bottom: Low-rise jeans with faux-fur waistband trim

accessories.jewelry: Thin bracelets rings and delicate hoop earrings
accessories.phone: Smartphone with black cat case featuring a pink bow Hello-Kitty style

props_in_scene.background: Wood-grain stall doors with verticals kept true metal hinges subtly visible
props_in_scene.counter: Keep any edge reflections soft and realistic

camera_technical.requirements: Correct mirror reversal maintain natural body proportions no duplicated phones/hands
camera_technical.capture: Smartphone wide lens ~24–26mm equiv f/1.8 look ISO ~250 1/125s WB 4200–4400K
camera_technical.composition: Subject centered with slight lean keep fur texture readable ensure phone and hand pose feel natural
camera_technical.retouching: Clean minor blemishes only preserve fabric micro-wrinkles and fur fibers avoid haloing
camera_technical.avoid: Warped doors heavy vignettes oversharpening cartoon smoothing text/watermarks
